definition: to decline/to wane/to become weak or feeble

sentences.english: Chronics as the process is, the kidney failure may occur rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 虽然这一过程是慢性的，但肾衰竭也可能迅速出现。

sentences.english: Conclusions Elderly patients with chronic heart failure can tolerate carvedilol treatment.
sentences.chinese: 结论老年心力衰竭患者基本可以耐受卡维地洛治疗。

sentences.english: Three patients were died among which 2 were died of mycotic septicemia and 1 cardiac failure.
sentences.chinese: 合并霉菌性败血症2例，合并心功能衰竭1例。

sentences.english: There are increased risks of infection or organ failure if blood is too old.
sentences.chinese: 储存期过长的血液有导致感染或器官衰竭的风险。

sentences.english: In these patients, the virus directly infects the lung, causing severe respiratory failure.
sentences.chinese: 病毒直接感染这些病人的肺部，造成严重呼吸衰竭。

sentences.english: Few cases of fulminant liver failure in association with long term minocycline application have been reported.
sentences.chinese: 几例长期应用米诺环素引起的肝衰竭被报告。

sentences.english: To summarize the guardianship of mechanical ventilation to treat respiratory failure.
sentences.chinese: 总结机械通气治疗呼吸衰竭的监护经验。

sentences.english: The common complications and important death cause of IIR is the respiration function failure.
sentences.chinese: 呼吸功能衰竭是IIR的常见并发症和重要死亡原因。

sentences.english: Used to identify factors or pre-renal acute renal failure caused by oliguria.
sentences.chinese: 用于鉴别肾前性因素或急性肾功能衰竭引起的少尿。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the curative effect of synergsim on headstrong heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨联合用药治疗顽固性心力衰竭的疗效。

sentences.english: This very lump of flesh lying here in decline is reality.
sentences.chinese: 躺在这里逐渐衰竭的臭皮囊，是真实法。

sentences.english: Foxglove can calls cause heart failure, yet .
sentences.chinese: 指顶花能引起心脏衰竭。

sentences.english: Non-invasive respirator is an important tool to treat various types of respiratory failure.
sentences.chinese: 无创人工呼吸机是治疗各种类型呼吸衰竭的重要手段。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of valsartan in the treatment of congestive heart failure(CHF).
sentences.chinese: 目的旨在探讨缬沙坦在充血性心力衰竭中的治疗作用。

sentences.english: NAFLD can lead to liver failure.
sentences.chinese: 非酒精性脂肪肝会导致肝功能衰竭。

sentences.english: Biventricular pacemakers were initially approved for people with severe heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 双腔起搏器最初被批准应用于严重心力衰竭的患者。

definition: to decline/to fall/to drop/to falter/a decline/recession (in economics)
to exhaust/to use up/to deplete/to drain
to wither/to dry up (of a plant)/to atrophy (of muscle, social custom etc)
final radiance of setting sun/fig. dying flash (of lucidity or activity, prior to demise)
Cachexia (physical wasting associated with long-term illness)
unable to turn around a hopeless situation (idiom)/to fail to save the situation
omen/sign (that sth is about to happen)/warning sign
